name: Vito Senič
summary: Driven CS student focused on AI, automation, and building scalable web solutions. Always learning, always shipping.
focus_now: Currently building an AI first agency and finishing Computer Science at FERI.

bullets: Worked on decentralized identity (SSI, DID, VC).
Focused on R&D and prototyping blockchain integrations.
Contributed to open source projects: [EduCTX Issuer Platform](https://github.com/blockchain-lab-um/issuer-platform-EduCTX) and [MASCA](https://github.com/blockchain-lab-um/masca).
Developed B2B software solutions for Big Bang.
Worked with Vue.js, REST APIs, and TypeScript.
Learned teamwork, API integration, and project planning.
Maintained e-commerce stores and automated workflows with Python.
Learned efficiency, automation, and client-facing work.
Managed online products and handled social media content.
Designed websites and created marketing materials.

roadmap.milestone: Early curiosity → video editing, modding games, file management.
First exposure to web dev → HTML & CSS → built fun websites.
Entered SERŠ (Computer Science) → learned C++ and Unity basics.
COVID pause → less productive, but gained perspective.
Worked at eAvio agency → WordPress e-commerce, marketing integrations, Python automation scripts.
Tried entrepreneurship → dropshipping, agencies, investing & crypto. Learned resilience and risk management.
Final high school project: Decentralized portfolio tracker (React + Node + Moralis). Rediscovered passion for programming.
Started CS & IT studies at FERI. Joined SolveX → Vue + TS, teamwork, APIs, project planning.
Blockchain course → joined Blockchain Lab. Worked on DID, VC, Veramo.
Startup Weekend → met co-founder. Began serious work in DevOps & Cloud (Docker, CI/CD, VPS, microservices) and AI integrations.
Balancing studies, lab work, and business. Building AI automation agency → merging LLMs, automation, and business execution.
